comment: Got a solid look at the overnight data and the forecast looks to be on track , but may need some tweaks . Amounts on the northeast Avalon look like they be closer to cm than cm . Granted the nuances of storms like this can be quite hard to pin down until they're here . <URL>

comment: Keep in mind they really dont know if its going to be cms or cms , the reason they are saying -50 cms . Hype it up to but most likely -30 . Time will tell and if you look at the track record of the last systems the highest amt never pans out . Everyone RELAX .
